Name: Name
minimumAmountTitle: Minimum Amount To Reserve in Account
deleteModalTitle: Are you sure you want to delete the selected items?
informationModal: The auto fill feature will automatically populate savings or debt with remaining leftover income after all expenses are paid for each budget cycle.
informationModal1: This is the minimum amount to keep in your account after expenses. Auto fill will input remaining income over this amount to savings or debt. This amount should be minimal as all expenses and personal spending will be accounted for.

SignUpScreen.Title: Create an account
SignUpScreen.passwordErrorUppercase: Passwords must have at least one uppercase character.
SignUpScreen.passwordErrorLowercase: Passwords must have at least one lowercase character.
SignUpScreen.passwordErrorDigit: Passwords must contain at least one digit.

ForgotPasswordScreen.Detail: Enter your email for the verification process, we will send a verification link to your email.
ForgotPasswordScreen.Toast: We've sent your password reset link to your email. Check your inbox.

OnBoardingScreen.onBoarding1: Set up a tailored budget aligned with your pay schedule by recording all your expenses and their due dates. This app creates a budget for every pay cycle and shows exactly which bills to pay during that period.
OnBoardingScreen.onBoarding2: Include one or multiple sources of income, whether fixed or variable. Variable income will require manual input at the start of each budget cycle.
OnBoardingScreen.onBoarding3: Have extra cash after paying your bills? Use the auto-fill feature to allocate leftover funds towards your debt. Simply choose which debt to pay down and start making progress!
OnBoardingScreen.onBoarding4: Track your savings progress and set goals.  Use the auto-fill feature to allocate leftover funds after expenses. A quick glance at your budget shows how much you can save while managing your bills.
OnBoardingScreen.onBoarding5: Get a detailed view of your income and expenses. Track your progress on debt reduction and savings, including goal timelines. Use our budget simulation feature to see if new expenses fit your budget.
OnBoardingScreen.onBoarding6: Planning for an oil change or facing unexpected medical bills? Use the 'one-time expense' feature to include these costs in your budget cycle, covering both expected and unforeseen expenses.
OnBoardingScreen.modalTitle: Do you want to see how better budget works?
